document.heading: Community Development Corporations Money Lender Licensing Fee and Bonding Exemption Temporary Amendment Act of 1995

history.narrative: Law 11-97, the “Community Development Corporations Money Lender Licensing Fee and Bonding Exemption Temporary Amendment Act of 1995,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-460. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 10, 1995, and December 5, 1995, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 1995, it was assigned Act No. 11-180 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-97 became effective on March 5, 1996.
